sentences.en: a long skirt with a slit up the side
a skirt with a slit up the side
A slit is provided for the coin to drop through.
sentences.cn: 狭长的口子是供投硬币用的.

sentences.en: He began to slit open each envelope.
He cut a slit in the top of the box.
sentences.cn: 他在盒子顶部割个口子.

sentences.en: Her long dress was slit up to the knee in Chinese style.
sentences.cn: 她的长裙按中国方式开口开到膝盖处.

sentences.en: If twill tape is useful, slit the hole with a hemostat.
sentences.cn: 如果用的是斜纹带就要用止血钳来张开小口.

sentences.en: light shining through a slit in the door
sentences.cn: 透过门缝照进来的光线

sentences.en: Light shone through a slit under the door.
sentences.cn: 光穿过门下的缝隙照射进来.

sentences.en: Make a slit in the stem about half an inch long.
sentences.cn: 在树干上切一道大约半英寸长的口子。

sentences.en: She reflected no longer than a second before she decisively slit the envelope.
sentences.cn: 她考虑了那么一瞬间就果决地撕开了信封。

sentences.en: She was wearing a white dress slit to the thigh.
sentences.cn: 她身穿一条开叉开到了大腿的白色连衣裙。

sentences.en: She watched them through a slit in the curtains.
sentences.cn: 她透过窗帘上的一道窄缝注视着他们。

sentences.en: The coat has been slit in two places.
sentences.cn: 这件外衣有两处裂开了.

sentences.en: The liquid cement will cover the slit between the layers.
sentences.cn: 液体胶合剂会遮住两层之间的接缝.

sentences.en: They say somebody slit her throat.
sentences.cn: 他们说有人割断了她的喉咙。
